subject: Steroids
Halls of Fame
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The 2012 Hall of Fame ballot includes a collection of some of the most prominent performers in recent baseball history. A decade ago, all would have been locks for Cooperstown. Not now.
